linesContent.text: While Charging a Grenade:
Chaotic Exchanger grants 20% Damage Resist.
Grenade Hits grant Chaotic Exchange, granting 2000% [PVP: 1000%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 1.75 seconds.
4 second cooldown.
Charged Vortex Grenade can proc twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.
Passively grants 20 Stability and -30 Reload Speed.
On Weapon or Grenade Kill:
6.6%  13.2%  20%  26.4%  33% Increased Damage and 20 Handling for 4.5 seconds.
Buff Refreshed on Kill. Grenade Kills grant all 5 stacks instantly.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds, to a maximum of 5 seconds.
Loads 2 Ammo at a time.
Reduces Reload Speed by 35.
Enhanced: Loads 3 Ammo instead of 2.
For one bullet only:
20 Aim Assist, 25 Range, -5% Accuracy Cone Size, -10% Accuracy Cone Growth.
3.1 seconds cooldown, resets if the weapon is shot.
While within 15 meters of an enemy: Multi-Dodge Ready appears on the Buff list.
After Dodging within 15 meters of an Enemy:
Unlimited Dodges for 6 seconds.
Can dodge up to 6 times per activation.
Multi-Dodge Dodges are unaffected by Mods that activate on Class Ability Use, alongside Winter's Shroud.
Effect immediately ends if you are over 15 meters away from an Enemy while Multi-Dodge is active.
+10 Accuracy
On Precision Kill:
Spawns a Large Stasis Crystal on Enemy Death Location.
Rank-and-File Combatants spawn a Medium Stasis Crystal.
Having 5 crystals active at once incurs in a 5 second cooldown.
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Stability
Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard.
On Glacial Guard Cast:
Grants Shielded buff and applies 40 Slow Stacks to Combatants within 7 meters.
Shielded lasts 20 seconds and grants a 100HP Overshield with 62.5% Damage Resist in PVE.
Shielded also refreshes on damage taken, prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding.
While Shielded is active, you cannot regain Class Ability Energy.
Activating Barricade while Glacial Guard is active will remove the effect.
On Precision Hit:
Decreases Draw Time by 25% for 3 seconds.
Enhanced: Budd duration increased to 4 seconds.
While below 113 HP:
Up to +100 Reload Speed with 0.9x Duration Multiplier
Effect increases linearly as health decreases
+10 Blast Radius
Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness
Shoulder Charges deal increased damage if used midair
(Arc/Solar/void)
Elite: 200%  ?  ?
Miniboss: 310%  ?  ?
Gain Invisibility on Powered Melee Kill. (Longer on Finishers)
Heals for X on Powered Melee Kill. (Stronger on Finishers)
Invisibility Duration:
Minor = 6 seconds (10)
Elite = 9 seconds (13)
Miniboss = 12.5 seconds (13)
Boss = 13 seconds (13)
Bosses and Vehicles are not finishable. Generally.
During slide after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds:
Generate a 180Â° frontal shield that reflects damage and projectiles.
Increases Slide Distance by 33%
Gain 1 Rapid Hit Stack per Precision Hit, granting Reload Speed and Stability for 2 seconds.
> 5  30  35  45  60 Reload Speed Stat
> 0.99x  0.97x  0.96x  0.94x  0.93x Reload Duration Scalar
> 2  12  14  18  25 Stability
Enhanced: Stronger Effect.
While Crouched:
30 Handling, 20 Stability, -40% Accuracy Cone Size, -17% Accuracy Cone Growth, -80% Recoil Yaw (Horizontal Recoil)
Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles.
Enhanced: Stronger effect.
+10 Range
On Sword Kill:
15% Increased Damage and sets Forward Movement Speed to 9 meters per second (Max Sprint Speed)
Increases Sword Lunge Distance.
Remains active even if stowed.
Radar immediately returns after stopping ADS. (Normally takes 1.5s)
Fusion Grenades have Fastball intrinsically and detonate on impact.
Kills with Fusion Grenades grant Grenade Energy.
25% for Minors
50% for Majors
100% for Guardians & Bosses
Grants Burning Fists on Melee Kill.
Burning Fists lasts 5 seconds and grants Bonus Melee Damage.
Bonus Melee Damage:
If on Scatter Grenades:
Gain an extra Grenade Charge
Scatter Grenades innately receive Chaos Accelerant's Tracking Bonus
Grenades fired from this weapon have increased proximity detection but a decreased blast radius.
Upon readying a weapon within 3 seconds of getting a Kill with a different weapon:
20% Increased Damage and 15 Handling for 7 seconds.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased to 8 seconds.
Upon dealing Melee Damage while an Enemy is within 15 meters:
500% [PVP: 100%] increased damage for one burst and 100 Handling for 10 seconds or until firing.
4 second cooldown. Can be activated while stowed.
Any Powered Melee which requires sprinting, sliding, or performs a slam will not activate Blunt Execution Rounds.
After dealing non-Precision Weapon Damage:
8% Increased Precision Damage for 0.3 seconds
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Stability.
Increases Shotgun Pellet Spread by 7.5%
Elemental Kills grant 1 stack of Recombination, increasing the damage of the next shot of the weapon, up to 10 stacks.
5%  10%  15%  20%  25%  30%  35%  40%  45%  50% for Heritage and Succession in PVP
Tripmine Grenades are enhanced and have Fastball intrinsically.
Enhanced Tripmine Grenades
14% increased damage from explosion.
X% Bigger Radius, with no Damage Falloff.
Last 30 seconds (10 -> 30) and have 100HP with 50% Damage Resist in PVP.
Removes self-damage from Tripmine Grenades.
Ability Damage recharges 33% of Grenade Ability.
Passively grants 50 Airborne Effectiveness, 100 Handling and 100 Reload Speed to Sidearms.
Upon readying a sidearm while at Critical Health:
100% and [PVP: 35%] increased damage until no longer critical.
Refreshes sidearm magazine.
On Weapon Kill:
X (a lot of) Handling for all weapons for 8 seconds.
Can be refreshed to up to 6 seconds.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased.
Damaging the Invader with this weapon marks them for allies.
X Handling for Y seconds after sprinting for Z seconds.
Grants an extra Smoke Bomb Charge.
Cloaking allies grants 50% Melee Energy per ally.
50% [PVP: 25%] Damage Resistance on any Invisible effects. Applies to teammates made invisible.
Damage Resistance does not apply in Super.
On Weapon Kill:
10%  20%  30% increased damage until stow or reload.
Enhanced: Passively grants 10 Magazine Stat (Identical to Tactical Mag).
Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Shotguns.
Shotgun Kills restore Melee Ability Energy.
10% Minors | 25% Anything Else
If your Void Melee Ability is Charged:
Shotgun Kills activates Void Overshield and consume your Melee Energy.
Passively grants 10 Aim Assist, and 3% Reduced Movement Speed Penalty from ADS and Strafing.
Enhanced: Aim Assist bonus is increased marginally.
Passively grants 20 Range and -30 Stability
On Dodge:
Grants Wraithmetal Mail for 9 seconds.
Wraithmetal Mail
Reloads all weapons
Grants 100 Handling (w/ 0.95x Multiplier), 100 Reload, and 50 Mobility.
Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%.
Increases Slide Distance by 33%.
While in Arc Staff:
Hits grant Synapse Junctions for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 3.
x1 = 13.5% Increased damage and X% Slower Passive Super Drain
x2 = 28.8% Increased damage and X% Slower Passive Super Drain
x3 = 46.2% Increased damage and X% Slower Passive Super Drain
Additive 25% Chance per Enemy hit with Arcbolt Grenade to recharge your Grenade Ability
Arcbolt Grenades chain up to 4 times (from 3)
Arcstrider Subclass Only
Receiving or Dealing Melee Damage grants Cross Counter for 3 seconds or until Melee Hit.
Cross Counter grants 200% increased Melee Damage and heals for XHP on Melee Hit.
One-Two Punch's bonus is reduced to 80% if Cross Counter is active.
Melee Kills, as well as Finishers weaken and blind, rendering the enemy unable to shoot and receive 30% increased damage.
Duration and Range are dependant on Enemy Rank.
Enemy Ranks are Minor/Elite/Miniboss/Boss.
Finishers add 5 seconds to Duration. Bosses are not finishable. Guardians count as Elites.
Warlord's End.
Range: 10/15/20/25 metres, centered on enemy.
Duration: 5/10/15/20 seconds.
Finisher Duration: 10/15/20 seconds.
+10 Reload
Rampage lasts 1 second longer (3.5s -> 4.5s)
While above 70% Magazine:
50 Reload Speed with a 0.95x Duration Scale
Enhanced: Reload increased to [55 maybe?]
Decreases charge time by 40, and damage by 2%
Stasis Subclass Only
Replaces Dodge with Shift.
Shift has a distance of 10 meters, and renders you completely invisible except for a trail for the duration of the shift.
Dodging grants Light Shift buff for 10 seconds.
PVE: Light Shift grants 10% increased damage to Slowed/Frozen targets, as well as granting 10% increased damage to Arc Weapons.
Dodge does not recharge while Light Shift buff is active.
While at Low Health:
30 Handling, -40% Accuracy Cone Size, and -17% Accuracy Cone Growth.
Effect increases linearly as Health decreases. Maximized strength at Critical Health.
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Stability.
Taking damage highlights the enemy that caused it for 8 seconds.
Killing the targeted enemy grants Vengeance for 6 seconds.
Vengeance grants a 95 HP Overshield.
On Ready:
100 Ready/Stow Handling with a 0.95x Duration Multiplier for 1 second, or until ADS.
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Handling.
Grants 25% [PVP: 15%] Damage Resist to Guardians inside your Rift.
Upon reaching Critical Health:
Dearly Departed grants 55% [PVP: 27.5%] Class Ability Energy.
Buff lasts until no longer Critical.
On Death:
Spawns a Healing Rift for 15 seconds.
-X% Hipfire Accuracy Cone Growth and 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier
Regain 7 Health on Kills
Using your Grenade or hitting an enemy with a Charged Melee Attack grants a stack of Well-Rounded. Using your Super Ability grants two stacks.
10 Range, 10 Stability, and 10 Handling per stack.
Lasts 10 seconds.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased to 11 seconds.
-40ms Charge Time
Does not reduce damage, unlike Charge Time MW.
Does not display in the stats.
Upon killing an enemy affected by a Void Debuff:
45[?]HP Overshield for 8 seconds.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased to 9 seconds.
After dealing non-ranged Melee Damage:
50% Increased damage, X Reload Speed, and 30 Handling for 5 seconds OR 3 shots.
Enhanced: Buff Effect is increased.
If Heavy Attack consumes the last Ammo:
67% Increased damage to Grounded Heavy Attack.
If Shoulder Charge Melee Ability is Charged:
Slowly grants 75 HP Overshield over 3 seconds after sprinting for 0.5 seconds
Overshield disappears instantly when not sprinting.
Recharges 50% of Melee Ability on Shoulder Charge Hit.
Includes Seismic Strike, Ballistic Slam, Hammer Strike, Shield Bash
Sets the Submachine Gun's Damage and Magazine Profile into that of a Precision Frame's.
Grants an extra Grenade Charge.
Does not Stack with Top Tree Striker
While Sprinting:
PVE: 2x Grenade/Melee Regeneration Speed />
PVP: 100% Additional Base Grenade/Melee Regeneration Rate. />
Gain an additional 100% [PVP: 200%] of your Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.
On Dodge:
6.25% Faster Sprint for 10 seconds.
Not refreshable.
Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Lumina.
Standing in a Rift creates Noble Seekers every 5 seconds that seeks out allies within 35 metres and apply a buff depending on the type of Rift.
Each time a Noble Seeker applies a buff, the Rift gets extended by 5 seconds.
Healing Rift Noble Seekers heal allies for 75HP and begins Health Regeneration.
Empowering Rift Noble Seekers grant a 35% and [PVP: 15%] Damage Increase for 5 seconds.
While Crouched:
Prevents Radar Ping from shooting, increased Reload Speed, and increases hold time by 25%
Grants an extra Coldsnap Grenade Charge.
Coldsnap Grenades have better tracking and grant [?]% Grenade Ability upon both hit and freezing an enemy.
Coldsnap Seekers travel 35% further.
Passively grants 50 Airborne Effectiveness.
If on Solar Subclass:
Aiming Down Sights while Airborne grants Tome of Dawn.
Tomes of Dawn:
Holds you in place midair
25% Reduced Flinch
Grants 15% Damage Resistance.
Lasts for 2.8 seconds. Hits refresh Y seconds.
Gain an extra Fusion Grenade Charge.
20% Grenade Energy per Weapon Hit while Empowered (0.3s Cooldown)
100% Class Ability Energy on Grenade Kill
Empowered is either Well of Radiance or Empowering Rift.
Casting Fists of Havoc grants Resolute.
Resolute is a 75HP Overshield that negates Precision Damage.
Overshield can be refreshed by unequipping and equipping but who is gonna do that to be quite honest.
Grants 15 Airborne Effectiveness
Passively grants:
- 35% Faster Projectile Velocity
- 10 Reload Speed with 0.8x Duration Multiplier
Enhanced: Increases Reload Speed.
0.5x Aim Down Sights Animation Scalar for Primary Weapons
0.75x Aim Down Sights Animation Scalar for Special Weapons
Enhanced: Passively grants 4 Stability.
While within 15 meters of 3 enemies:
Sets Blast Radius to 100[?] and reduces Self Damage by 40%.
Lingers for 4(?) seconds.
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Blast Radius.
Immediately upon being reduced below 110 HP:
Refreshes weapon, 50 Handling, and grants 5% Faster Ready/Stow Speed.
Works while stowed.
Enhanced: Health Requirement reduced.
7.77% Damage Increase against Elites and Minibosses
On Reload, within 3.8 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
33% Increased damage for 5 seconds.
Buff can't be refreshed. Persists through stow.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased to 5.5 seconds.
Decreases Shotgun Pellet Spread by 3.75
Reduces Precision Damage Multiplier
Upon hitting a Non-Matching Shield or a Barrier Champion Shield:
Hits deal increasingly higher damage against Combatant Shields, up to 500% increased damage.
Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.
29% per hit, up to 435%: Fusion Rifles
33.3% per hit, up to 500%: Auto Rifles, Machine Guns, Pulse Rifles, Trace Rifles
150% per hit, up to 450%: Linear Fusion Rifles [Maxes at 450%]
166.6% per hit, up to 500%: Bows, Glaives, Hand Cannons, and Scout Rifles
Enhanced: Damage Increase per stack and Maximum Damage Increase are increased by a multiplicative 20%
Daybreak Kills spawn both an Empowering and Healing Rift on Enemy Death Location.
While standing in a Rift:
Solar Weapon Kills grant X% Class Ability Energy.
While your Class Ability Energy is Full:
Weapon Kills consume your Class Ability Energy and spawn a Empowering + Healing Rift at the Target's Location.
Combines the penetration from Armor-Piercing Rounds, the guaranteed ricochets from Ricochet Rounds, and the flinch increase from High-Caliber Rounds.
Increases Damage Falloff Distance by 10%
While surrounded by at least 3 enemies within 15 meters, gain Class Ability Energy per Second.
3 Enemies = 3% | 4 Enemies = 5% | 5 Enemies =
1 second after casting Rift:
An Arc Shockwave is cast that deals 300 [PVP: 100] damage and heavily knockbacks in a 7.5 meter radius.
Passively grants 10 Airborne Effectiveness, 32 Reload and Handling to all weapons.
Increased Lunge Distance (4.5 meters -> 6.5 meters)
While Surrounded by 3+ enemies: Activates Biotic Enhancements
Biotic Enhancements increases Melee and Super damage for 8 seconds.
50% Super Damage Increase.
PVE: 200% Increased Melee Damage.
PVP: 100% Increased Melee Damage.
Increases Melee Lunge Range to 7 meters.
Melee Hits grant Stacks of Fury Conductors.
Receiving melee damage unleashes an Arc Explosion with a radius of 5 metres.
Arc Explosion deals 22% of your Melee Damage per Stack of Fury Conductors.
Fury Conductors grants 33-55-70% Damage Resistance to Melee Attacks depending on number of Stacks.
All Stacks disappear upon receiving melee damage or after 10 seconds of not dealing melee damage.
Powered Void Melee Kills grant 20% [PVP: 10%] Super Energy once per usage.
Sentinel Shield's Shield Throws regenerate 10% Super Energy
Sunspots grant Restoration x2.
Upon reaching Critical Health if your Class Ability is charged:
Spawns a Sunspot under you.
Casting your Class Ability spawns a Sunspot.
On Precision Kill:
70 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Duration Multiplier for 6 seconds.
Enhanced: Duration increased.
On Precision Kill: 10 Range per Stack, up to 30 Range at 3 Stacks.
On Non-Precision Kill: Removes 1 Stack. If at 0 stacks, it improves Accuracy and grants 30 Stability.
Lasts 7 seconds. Refreshed on Kill.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased.
Kills during Stormtrance grant Stacks of Ascending Amplitude for 8 seconds.
Ascending Amplitude increases Stormtrance Damage by 10% per Stack, up to 100% at 10 Stacks.
Refunds up to 50% of Super Energy based on Enemy Kills.
+40 Magazine Stat
-15 Handling
While surrounded by [?] enemies or by a Nightmare within [?] meters:
Kills restore [?]HP
While Last Guardian Standing:
100 Handling, Reload, and Aim Assist, massively decreased flinch received, increased accuracy, stronger scope highlight, and enables radar while ADS.
Passively grants 20 Handling and 20 Reload Speed
Explosion releases 8 Cluster Bombs.
Each Cluster Bomb deals an additional 3% damage.
Stunning a Champion refreshes X% of your Magazine, heals 60HP, and grants 40 Recovery for 3 seconds.
Guarding with Banner Shield blinds enemies within 7 metres for 5 seconds.
Any Ward of Dawn that you create grants Starless Night, which gives a 65HP Void Overshield to any ally that enters.
Enemies that enter your Ward of Dawn are also blinded for 5 seconds.
0.9x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier
If on Void Subclass:
Empowering Rift grants Devour.
Empowering Rift grants Overload Shot, allowing all weapons to disrupt on hit. (Weapons with Breaker Properties will not benefit from this.)
Does not work with Well of Radiance.
Scoring 4 Precision Hits generates 2 Ammo to Magazine.
Precision Hit counter is reset if no precision hits are scored within 2 seconds.
Enhanced: Timer between Precision Hits is increased.
During Sustained Fire:
Gradually greatly increases Accuracy, and adds up to +10 Stability. Takes 0.6 seconds to maximize effect.
The accuracy improvement is greater than initial accuracy.
The accuracy increase is gradual, almost completely negating the effects of bloom.
Enhanced: Effect reaches full effect sooner.
Weapon Kills while inside an Empowering or Healing Rift grant Blood Magic
Blood Magic halts the duration of the Rift.
Blood Magic Duration:
5 seconds of per Kill. Caps at 15 seconds.
If Magazine is Full:
25% Increased damage and causes enemies to explode on death.
Passively grants 30 Magazine Size
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Stability.
While continuously moving:
After 2 seconds: 5 Stability, 5 Handling, and 5 Reload at x1 Stack.
After 10 seconds: 15 Stability, 15 Handling and 15 Reload at x2 Stacks.
Being still for 0.5 seconds removes all stacks. Works while stowed.
Enhanced: Stacks remain for up to 1 second after being still.
Upon reloading with an empty magazine:
15% Faster Reload Animation
Gain an additional Shield Throw charge.
Shield Throw grants Anti-Barrier capabilities.
Passively grants 40 Airborne Effectiveness to Bows.
Bows are able to hold perfect draws indefinitely.
Bows have a -30ms Draw Time.
Blade Barrage Hits and Kills refund Super Energy.
Caps at 50% Super Energy.
Refund Amount depends on Kills and Hits, as well as Enemy Rank.
Duskfield Grenades have [?]% increased radius and have a 152 second base cooldown.
While inside a Duskfield Grenade's Slowing Field:
Enemies deal 50% [PVP: 20%] reduced damage, and allies receive 25% [PVP: 15%] reduced damage.
When combined with Touch of Winter:
Crystal increases from Medium to Large, and radius is increased additively.
Additive 10% Increased Surrounded Damage Increase, and lingers for 1.5s
10% Damage Increase against Taken Combatants.
After not shooting for 4 seconds:
Refreshes 10% of Magazine Capacity. Maxes out at Double Magazine Capacity.
+35 Recoil Direction
-10 Range
On Precision Kill:
70 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Duration Multiplier for 6 seconds.
Enhanced: Duration increased.
On Weapon Kill:
10 Resilience and 5% Damage Resist against Combatants for 5 seconds.
Stacks up to 3 times.
Damage Increase against Bosses, Minibosses, and Vehicles.
Primary: 20%  Special: 15%  Heavy: 10%
Against Player Supers Only:
Primary: 40% to 50%  Special: 10% to 20%  Heavy: 5% to 10%
The lower Damage Increase is against supers with no extra Damage Resistance.
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.
On Power Ammo Pickup:
Grants (almost) the equivalent of 1 Special Ammo Pickup.
Enhanced: Increases the amount of Special Ammo received.
Increased Flinch on Enemies.
[PVE] Allows Primary Weapons to affect higher ranked enemies and consistently stunlock Minors.
[PVP] Flinch amount against Guardians varies between Weapon Archetypes, from 6% to 11% Increased Flinch received.
On Precision Kill:
Target explodes, dealing Solar Damage in a 3 meter radius. Same size as Dragonfly, but deals 25% increased damage.
50 Reload Speed for 6 seconds.
Not affected by Dragonfly Spec.
On Weapon Kill:
-15% Accuracy Cone Growth, 15 Stability, and ~20 Recoil Direction.
Stacks up to 2x.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased.
After Damaging 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each:
10 Range with 5% Increased Falloff Distance, 10 Stability, 35 Handling, and 35 Reload Speed with 0.95x Duration Multiplier for 10 seconds.
Buff can't be refreshed.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased to 11 seconds.
+15 Recoil Direction
For 4 seconds after readying a Fusion Rifle:
30% Faster Charge Rate, 20% decreased damage, and 100 Handling
15% Increased Damage against Vehicles and Constructs
30% Increased Damage against Turrets, Barricades, and Stasis Crystals
On Melee Kill:
Weapons get refreshed.
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.
As Magazine goes below 50% until empty:
Up to -% Accuracy Cone Size, -% Accuracy Cone Growth, and 30[?] Stability.
Enhanced: Stronger effect.
Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness
If on Solar Subclass
75% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate
If Solar Super is Charged.
350% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate
On Barricade Cast:
Generates a Healing Pulse which heals both the user and allies within 12 metres.
Healing Pulse heals for either 58 HP OR to 130HP, depending on which is highest.
Requires Line-of-Sight to allies.
Supers generate 1 extra Orb of Power.
Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Auto Rifles and Machine Guns.
Refreshes 10% of equipped Auto Rifle/Machine Gun magazine every 1.5 seconds.
On Elemental/Barrier Champion or Guardian Shield Break:
Debuffs the enemy, increasing Kinetic Damage by 50% for 5.5 seconds.
Stacks with other Debuffs, as it is a Weapon Perk.
Enhanced: Debuff Duration is increased.
Upon readying a Sword:
30% Increased damage for 1.5 seconds.
Increases charge time by 40, and damage by 2%
Intrinsic Hand Cannon Holster
100 Handling Ready Speed with 0.6x Duration Multiplier, 20 Airborne Effectiveness, and -40% Accuracy Cone Size on Ready for 4 seconds.
Upon readying a Kinetic or Matching Hand Cannon with a Full Magazine:
60% increased damage per hit for 5 seconds. Maxes out at 600% after 10 Hits.
Only works against Combatants.
For Exotic Hand Cannon interactions, go to Court's Spreadsheet
After the Buff runs out, you swap weapons, or firing after the 5 second period:
You cannot gain stacks or reacquire the buff for 10 seconds.
Deadfall returns Ability Energy per Enemy Tethered.
X% Super Energy. Max of 50% Super Energy.
10% Grenade
10% Melee
10% Class Ability Energy.
Moebius Quiver can fire an additional volley per Super Activation.
Passively grants -50 Airborne Effectiveness
Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%.
Increases Slide Distance by 33%.
Increased Jump Height:
High Jump = 9 meters -> 12 meters (33% higher)
Strafe Jump = 8 meters -> 9 meters (10% higher)
Triple Jump = 6 meters -> 7 meters for First Jump (16% higher)
9 meters -> 11 meters for Second Jump (22% higher)
Kills grant 5% Class Ability Energy.
+10 Aim Assist
-15 Stability
Grenades fired from this weapon emit a blast that staggers enemies.
Maxes out Sword's Guard Resistance, Efficiency, and Endurance.
Perfectly timed blocks heal for 80(?) HP.
Blocking Specifics:
Swords grant 90% Damage Resistance.
Sword Energy does not decay from blocking damage or holding guard.
After 3 Powered Hits within [2?] seconds of each:
Gain +1 Ammo.
During Slide, after Sprinting for 1.5 seconds:
20% Increased damage and 100ms increased Charge Rate for [?] seconds.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased.

20% Increased Precision Damage
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Range.

Changes Weapon Element to match your selected Subclass until stowed.
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Handling.
While within 15[?] meters of 2 enemies:
Charge/Draw Time is reduced by 100 miliseconds.
Lingers for 1.5 seconds.
Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Stability.
On Weapon Kill:
Refreshes 10% of Magazine.
Submachine Guns and Auto Rifles: 17%
Enhanced: Magazine Refresh increased to 20%
Alters Towering Barricade
Assault Barricade has reduced health and duration, but enables you and your allies to shoot through it.
Barricade Stats
PVP: 600HP -> 350HP
20 seconds -> 10 seconds
50% Increased Damage and Radius for Dragonfly explosions
On Dodge:
Drops a Parting Gift that explodes and deals 120 damage over 7.5 metres with a 1(?) second fuse.
Parting Gift has an additional effect based on Subclass:
Arc: Blind for 7 [PVP: 3] seconds
Solar: [?] Scorch
Stasis: Slows for 2 seconds and refreshes Slow Stacks. Does not apply Slow Stacks by itself
Void: Suppress for 9 [PVP: 7] seconds (Does not apply to Guardians in Super)
Suppression generally does not activate effects that activate on suppressing.
If hipfiring:
20% Increased: Aim Assist Falloff Distance, Reticle Stickiness Falloff Distance, Damage Falloff Start and End Distance
15 Aim Assist
+2.7 degrees Precision Angle Threshold
-30% Accuracy Cone Size and ~30 Stability.
Damage Falloff Multipliers do not apply to The Last Word, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Fusion Rifles.
Enhanced: Stronger Effect.
-40ms Draw Time
Bullets are guaranteed to ricochet off of surfaces.
Immediately upon firing:
40 Stability, -50% Max Recoil Kick, and -10% Accuracy Cone Size for 0.6 seconds.
[Fusion Rifles Only Receive 25% of the benefits]
Enhanced: Stronger Effect, duration increased to 0.76 seconds.
[Controller-Only] Weapon fires the instant trigger pressure is applied.
On Weapon kill while your Super is charged:
20 Discipline and 20 Strength for 12 seconds.
Numbers in [brackets] represent PVP values.
Ability use grants Empowered for other abilities for 10 [5] seconds, depending on the Ability used.
e.g.: Barricade -> Empowered Melee and Empowered Grenade.
While Empowered:
Empowered Melee: 10% | 20% Increased damage.
400% [100%] | 800% [200%] Additional Base Melee Regeneration Rate.
Empowered Grenade: 20% [10%] | 35% [20%] Increased damage.
400% [100%] | 800% [200%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate.
Empowered Barricade: X% | Y% Increased HP.
150% [37.5%] | 300% [75%] Additional Base Barricade Regeneration Rate.
Chaos Reach recovers 10% Super Ability Energy on hit. 0.75s Cooldown.
Can increase Super Duration by up to 100%.
Splits 55% of Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that deals 30% Increased Damage in PVE and has no damage falloff.
Detonates after 0.6 seconds.
[PVE] 16% Increased Body Shot Damage. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on Precision Multiplier.
[PVP] Total damage remains the same.
5% Increased damage against Combatant Shields.
Bullets are able to overpenetrate enemies once.
Weapons Kills with a Matching Subclass Element grant Stacks of Death Throes
Each Stack of Death Throes grants 50% Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate
and 20% Increased Grenade Damage.
Max of 5 Stacks. Lasts 11 seconds.
On Grenade Ability Use:
